```{r}
library(dslabs)
data("gapminder")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)


```

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  select(continent, region, gdp, population) %>%
  mutate(gdp_per_capita = gdp / population) %>% 
  arrange(desc(gdp_per_capita)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=gdp_per_capita)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 30)
```
